title: Okay Ranked
body:
Well... this is impressive. If you wanna verify this on the client, feel free to check my info. My summoner name is Winterblossom right now. But jesus.
What is it today?
I've won 8 straight ranked games. I mean Anivia is pretty easy to play. And even easier to counter.
But...
8 ranked games with Aniv mid.
Wot.

replies.body: That is beautiful. Also nice to see someone who plays Anivia :D
